# secondaryText

**Instance Property**

The secondary text.

## Declaration

```swift
var secondaryText: String? { get set }
```

## Customizing Content

- **image**: The image to display.
- **text**: The primary text.
- **personNameComponents**: The name the system uses when creating a monogram image.
